Title: Worst Nightmare
Plot: The NCIS team has to find a young girl that was kidnapped, but their investigation turns into something else when her grandfather gets way too involved.
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: William Devane, Sam Anderson, Zack Lively, Elizabeth Wright Shapiro, David Magidoff, Rebecca Lowman, J.P. Hubbell, Sadie Calvano
